q8-2-stress-strain-curve.title: Stress-Strain Curve (Q8.2)
q8-2-stress-strain-curve.description: Young's modulus = slope; yield strength where curve deviates from linear.

q8-3-stress-strain-comparison.title: Stress-Strain: Materials A vs B
q8-3-stress-strain-comparison.description: Steeper slope = greater Young's modulus. Higher break stress = stronger.

q8-5-wire-loading.title: Steel & Brass Wires with Loads (Fig 8.11)
q8-5-wire-loading.description: Steel supports 4 kg; brass supports 4+6=10 kg. Elongation Î”L = FL/(AY).
